text: Hello what do you think about worthwhile charities?
I like charities and I think it is important to help others.
Me too, one I particularly like is Save The Children because I think kids need our help
Okay. I have never heard of it. What is the goal of that charity?
They are a worldwide charity that help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc.  Their website is  URL
Alright. Thank you for the information. I understand that they help educate children and keep them healthy and safe.Do you know if the organization is world wide or just a certain nation?
They are worldwide for sure, for instance they are helping a lot in Syria. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
Wow. That is interesting. How did the organization help in Syria?
Well refugees are fleeing Syria left and right and they help with food, supplies and shelter and also protection.  They are direct on the ground.
Oh, that is good. I like the idea of helping the people in Syria. They are definitely in need of help.
Well would you like to donate to Save The Children?  Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I think I would be interested in giving. Do I just choose an amount and it will be deducted from payment?
If I read this right, after we chat the research team will collect all donations and send it themselves.
Okay. I definitely think I want to help. I am strongly considering giving to the charity since it appears to be legitimate.
Yes I have TV ads for them before, they say help a child for the price of a cup of coffee.
Okay, there are so many scams that I have to ask questions before donating.
Oh without doubt, the website is legit and like I said I have seen them on TV before.
Alright, I would like to give 1 dollar to the charity.
Ok I was going to say I will match whatever you decide to donate, so I will do the same!
That is great. Thank you for being so supportive.
